title: 10 Minute Balancing Breathwork
description:
A ten minute breathwork session holds powerful potential for balancing and healing. I will guide you through a series of breaths, sequenced together to create a feeling of balanced energy in the body. This session is backed by science and a good one to save, favorite - or just have in your back pocket. Made with love and designed for those who seek emotional balance, mental clarity, or focus in transition. 

*This practice is also just a beautiful way to fit in a little time to connect with yourself, fit this into your daily routine if you are feeling stuck, and let me know what you notice by replying in the comment section below! 


For more videos like this, check out:

Ujjayi Breathing
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IQrsJ-yZWV8

Breath of Fire - Pranayama Series
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jbtLH-3DfLc

Yogic Breath Technique - Alternate Nostril Breathing
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8VwufJrUhic

Lions Breath
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdUyHPa66A4

channelDescription:
WELCOME to Yoga With Adriene! Our mission is to connect as many people as possible through high-quality free yoga videos. 
We welcome all levels, all bodies, all genders, all souls!
If you're brand-new to yoga, check out my Yoga For Beginners and Foundations of Yoga series. These are designed to give you the tools to build a happy, healthy at-home yoga practice. 
Do your best, be authentic, and FIND WHAT FEELS GOOD.
Jump on in! You don't even have to leave your house. 

Love, Adriene

comments: A little cry at the end makes me feel how necessary this was. Adriene, you’re a life changer. Everyday.

I just want to say I’m so happy that you’ve kept the same introductory music and video to lead into your practice after so many years. I began following your videos in 2013 and it’s like home to hear that beginning song and the shot of young Adriene in siddhasana. Thank you for keeping this the same!
Exhale day 21🎉 a little bit of breath work to start the day in the best way, thank you, Adriene, for this practice. 💖🧘🏼‍♀️🙏🏻

Discovering the breath has been an amazing addition !! Ps Benji is so ZEN - our quick breath activity had my pup doing circls lol ! Thank you Adriene for your continual efforts and blessings, May you be blessed today!

Blessed Beloved Beauties! Exhale Day -  21 is an ideal return to the practice after a brief hiatus. I began to feel uneasy last Friday and couldn't keep anything on my stomach not even ginger ale or crackers. Thankfully, the following day the nausea subsided and I successfully kept down ginger ale, soup 🍲 broth, and crackers. I spoke with a nurse on Saturday and we ruled out many things that aren't with the  symptom of nausea only; no stomach virus, or any other virus, and no ear ache. Well, I'm getting better every day, and my stomach began to feel tight with subtle cramps off and on the next day, so hubby will go with me to the doctor's office Saturday to have my vitals checked. I'm grateful for the final return to the yoga mat. This session is healing and therapeutic. How has everyone else been? Best wishes, everyone! 🦋❤️🦋
